name: High Class Travel
overview:
High Class Travel is a leading airline consolidator specializing in providing clientele with discounted first-class and business class airfare tickets for both domestic and international flights.

With amazing itinerary options and bargain-priced quotes that are up to 60% lower than published airline fares, High Class Travel has garnered a sterling reputation within the discount ticketing industry by developing a strong network of affiliated travel agents and clientele who have come to appreciate the high levels of service, reliability and professionalism offered.

Boasting industry affiliations with over 50 global airline carriers including American Airlines, British Airways, Cathay Pacific, El Al and Lufthansa, High Class travel consistently offers unbeatable airfare rates for flights throughout the world along with the ability to book international flights at the very last minute.
